scripts.build:win64: cargo build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu && nj-cli build --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu --out-dir bindings/win64
scripts.build:linux-arm64: cargo build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && nj-cli build --release --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --out-dir bindings/linux-x64
scripts.build:macos64: cargo build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin && nj-cli build --release --target x86_64-apple-darwin --out-dir bindings/darwin-x64
scripts.build-all: npm run build:linux-arm64 && npm run build:macos64
